name: Feed The Fire (spaceCoder)
description:
You play as a fire wizard trying to survive hoards of enemies, but there is a twist! Your fireballs are also your life force. Try to survive while also balancing your ammo and your life!

Most of the assets are from the 16x16 dungeon tile set. The leech is something I drew myself. I also used assets from the grafx kid pack and from Foozlecc
